org.regexml
Class ExpressionFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.regexml.ExpressionFactory

public class ExpressionFactory
extends java.lang.Object

Constructs regular expressions from an XML file. Note that this class is not thread safe. Use of a ThreadLocal variable is recommended if this factory is to be called from multiple threads.

getExpression

                         throws ExpressionNotFoundException
Retrieves an expression based on the given ID.

Parameters:
id - ID of expression
Returns:
Expression object containing the regular expression string and a pattern object
